name: Free Fall Enterprise
description:
REQUIRES AN XBOX 360/XBOX ONE CONTROLLER!

Use the analogue sticks and triggers to move your limbs around to squeeze through the different shaped gaps. See how far you can free fall..

Created by  Daniel Langsford, Mark Pearce and Sean Flannigan for the Global Game Jam 2016. 

Feat. Music by Kevin MacLeod.

Global Game Jam entry page:

https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/free-fall-enterprise
